short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Brings a soft, tranquil vibe to your browser with its soothing pastel colors.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Featuring delicate, translucent pink petals set against a gentle blue sky, this theme evokes a sense of calm and natural beauty. Ideal for users who appreciate floral aesthetics and seek a serene browsing experience.

Key features:
- Beautiful background.
- Quick access to frequently visited sites.
- Real-time weather display and clock.
